page.title: 14MY SCHOOL
page.content: My school is a primary school.Children start school at{four}years old and leave my school at{eleven}years old when they go to the Comprehensive School. My headmaster's name is Mr.Thomas. There are{twelve}classes in school and {320}children. Some of the classes are temporary mobiles on the playground. Other classes are held in the old Youth Club buildings. There are three playgrounds ,two are fields and one is tarmac. On the tarmac are drawn hop-scotch and other playground games. In the winter we take our sledges to school and slide down the far slope.
